title: Rammus only has 6 lines of dialogue...
body:
"OK"

/Edit: That is his total amount of lines...

replies.body:
Literally:

**Upon selection:**
"Ok."

**Movement/attacking**
"Yeah."
"Alright."
"Ok."
"Yeh."
"Hmm."
"Right."

**Taunt:**
Rammus says nothing, merely raising his arms in triumph.

**Laugh:**
Rammus puts his arms on his belly and mimics laughs but makes no sound.

As a sidenote, Rammus has a taunt in other languages (at least in Spanish).

They really should give him a sound effect for his laugh and taunt.

For his joke they should make Rammus simply say "OK"

No, he should go like this:

{{champion:33}} : No.
I want to play Rammus now and hear his wonderful wise words

At least it's not-

"SHURIMA"

gah! Holy shit azir, could you not-

"SHURIMA IS THE SHIT"

I bet, but for real, I'm trying t-

"ALL PATHS LEAD TO SHURIMA."

Dammit! Die!

"Shurima..." -Azir, upon dying. Not even kidding.
And he is PERFECT EXACTLY HOW HE IS. :3 Ok.
Enter thread to say ok. Leave thread depressed.

Hey guys here is an oldie but a goodie.   Known as Rammus Taunts Everyone!

Kayle - "Your sister's hotter."

Morgana - "Your sister's hotter."
I remember this.... my fav was the lux one, Ima shoop da whoop ur ass
Only in english version. I hear he has full dialogue around the world. Which I what to know what went through Rammus's VA to do that.
Hmm....6 lines?  That is 4 more than Malphite.  :)
It saddens me that Maokai is quite eloquent while Malph feels like ugh... mentally challenged. They are buddies but you can't even imagine their conversation.
—and every single one of them is pure cinematic GOLD!

{{champion:33}}  is the "ice cube" of this game imo
Rammus VU causes him to say Ok, Yeah, Alright, Hmmm, and such in 50 different ways each.
Be careful what you ask for. His eventual rework will give him 500 lines of dialogue, each one a Shakespearean sonnet on the nature of mortality and the natural beauty of the jungles.

Yeah but look what he turns into when he is allowed to talk:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V-8Q4PM4PXM
Remember when Rammus threads were fun and simple?
Rammus has 6 lines. Meanwhile in Dota, Windrunner has 265 lines in game.
